definition: see 壓根兒|压根儿[ya4 gen1 r5]
to press/to push down/to keep under (control)/pressure

sentences.english: The water penetrative mechanism was derived from the study under the conditions of different pressure or pressure cycles.
sentences.chinese: 实验研究不同渗透压和循环渗透周次下水的渗透规律。

sentences.english: And what that means is, it actually makes osmotic pressure a very, very sensitive measurement method.
sentences.chinese: 这意味着，渗透压是一个非常，有效地测量手段。

sentences.english: Any other questions? OK. I didn't get to osmotic pressure.
sentences.chinese: 还有其他问题吗？我今天不讲渗透压。
我研究的是渗透压测定方法。

sentences.english: Jevity 1 Cal is an isotonic fiber-fortified tube-feeding formula.
sentences.chinese: 健营素1卡设有等渗透压纤维强化管饲配方。

sentences.english: The Escherichia coli strain DH42 is sensitive to high osmolarity in an alkaline medium.
sentences.chinese: 大肠杆菌DH42突变株碱性条件下对高渗透压敏感。

sentences.english: Sodium is the major intravascular ion that influences serum osmolality.
sentences.chinese: 钠是血管内影响血浆渗透压的主要离子。

sentences.english: The principles of osmotic pressure is applied in the process of converting sea water to fresh water.
sentences.chinese: 渗透压原理被利用在把海水变成淡水的过程中。

sentences.english: And after osmotic pressure, you'll be done with thermo.
sentences.chinese: 学完渗透压之后，你们就把热力学学完了。

sentences.english: One of them is osmotic pressure.
Balance when the pressure difference is equal to the osmotic pressure.
sentences.chinese: 平衡时，膜两侧压力差等于渗透压。

sentences.english: So you can build up some high pressure, what's called osmotic pressure.
sentences.chinese: 所以你能逐步积累起较高的压强，那就叫做渗透压。

sentences.english: So what's the osmotic pressure of the solution.
sentences.chinese: 那么溶液的渗透压是多少。
